title: Sensex extends losses to 252 points as FII selling continues amid geopolitical tensions

content.author: Anupama Ghosh
content.description: Markets extended their morning losses during the midday session on Tuesday, with the Sensex declining 252.73 points or 0.31% to 81,543.42 and the Nifty falling 91 points or 0.36% to 24,855.50.
